data.title: Latest news updates, pictures, video, reaction
data.meta_description: As the lead singer of the band Simply Red, Mick Hucknell was at the height of his fame in the mid 1980s. Known for his trademark curly red hair he has openly spoken about being abandoned by his mother as a toddler. He married wife, Gabriella, in 2010 with whom he has one child, a daughter called Romy.
data.text: As the lead singer of the band Simply Red, Mick Hucknell was at the height of his fame in the mid 1980s. Known for his trademark curly red hair he has openly spoken about being abandoned by his mother as a toddler. He married wife, Gabriella, in 2010 with whom he has one child, a daughter called Romy.
